name: DMDII Members-Only Technology Showcase
description:
Join DMDII members to hear about the latest work from the Institute through project team presentations, demos, and panel discussions. 
 *more details to come closer to event date
location: 1161 Oak Valley Drive, Ann Arbor, MI

name: Augmented Reality Stakeholders Convene to Move Technology Forward
location: 1161 Oak Valley Drive, Ann Arbor, MI

name: mHUB Presents, First Industrial Responders Emerge (FIRE) Panel Discussion: Trends in Product Innovation
description: Join industry leaders for an evening of discussions, networking and tours of mHUB! First Industrial Responders Emerge panelists will address innovation, product sourcing, business best practices and supplier networks and lead breakout discussions.
location: 1161 Oak Valley Drive, Ann Arbor, MI

name: City Digital’s David Leopold will give a keynote talk about “Mapping the Street of the Future,” featuring insights, opportunities, and lessons learned from City Digital’s underground infrastructure mapping pilot and other related projects.
description: The first in a three-part series, this one-day workshop, hosted by Boston University, will bring together city leaders, utilities, planners and academic researchers to identify barriers and challenges to coordinated infrastructure management in aging cities, and explore emerging solutions. Together, attendees will consider both above and below ground infrastructure, from lights, lanes and greenery to pipes, roots and soil.
location: 1161 Oak Valley Drive, Ann Arbor, MI
